1.name: Literacraft
1.description: An AI-powered system that generates high-quality books, novellas, and creative content ready for publishing.

1.WorkflowPromptTriple00001: ($AgentPrompt = "You are a bestselling author named ${authorName}, specializing in worldbuilding, creative cinematic universes, and writing novels with global appeal.
